name: MoonLit (Hugo_Charrier)
description:
MoonLit is an experimental game made during the Glogal Game Jam 2019.

The topic of the GGJ was the sentence " What means home to you ? ", so my group and me decided to make a game about a blind people in his house. It didn't tried to do an educative game, as i said before, it's an experience to show the difficulty of the blindness.

An other important aspect of the game is the controller, you can play with Joycon from Switch. 

We also made a keyboard controller for the people who don't possess a Switch.
